structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.text: Whenever any property is going to be taken or damaged by the board pursuant to this chapter, the board may effect an agreement with the owner for compensation therefor. If no agreement is reached, the board may condemn the property pursuant to the Eminent Domain Act of Kentucky.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st. Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 224, effective January 2, 1978.
